content: 20 ws repeat row 10 knit to last 3 sts slip 3 sts purl-wise wyif repeat row 19-20 until you have 19 sts on needle 180 row bind off leaving plenty of tail to seam together edges wet block to schematic below when dry fold kerchief in half so seaming edges are together seam together using mattress stitch with rs facing out this video is helpful for seaming instructions https //bit ly/seaming1 weave in ends seaming edge bind-off 19 stitches block to 2 5 d e b c lo re c a k s to 2 e s id 7 e i-c o round e d g in g seaming edge 19 row block to 2 5 cast on edge 87 stitches block to 20 block to 22 180 row straight edge i-cord edging approx instructions ut o g n ci a s f r e n d li ol f kiss and shell by wendee shulsen www hazelknits com page 3
